details: This course covers the basics of digital marketing, including SEO, SEM, social media marketing, and email marketing. Suitable for beginners.
An advanced course in web development covering topics such as JavaScript frameworks, server-side scripting, and responsive design.
Learn how to analyze business data using statistical techniques and data visualization tools. Suitable for professionals in marketing, finance, and operations.
Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms using industry-standard tools and technologies. Prerequisite: basic programming knowledge.
Craft effective social media marketing strategies to build brand awareness, engage audiences, and drive conversions. Includes case studies and practical exercises.
Learn the fundamentals of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design principles and best practices. Hands-on projects included.
Master the art of content marketing, including content creation, distribution, and measurement. Suitable for marketers, bloggers, and entrepreneurs.
Learn how to launch and manage a successful e-commerce business, including product sourcing, online store setup, and digital marketing strategies.
Become an expert in SEO techniques to improve website ranking, drive organic traffic, and increase online visibility. Includes advanced keyword research and link building strategies.
